title: Elegant Swarna Mangalsutra with Diamond Accents
materials: G-H Color). Features a durable and lustrous finish.
features: This contemporary mangalsutra features delicate, tear-drop shaped pendants interspersed along a strand of traditional black beads. Each pendant is meticulously crafted in rose gold and encrusted with sparkling diamonds. The design seamlessly blends traditional elements with a modern, minimalist aesthetic.
occasions: casual outings. A symbol of love and commitment.
